titleStmt.title: The reformado, precisely charactered by a transformed church-warden, at a vestry, London. The motion of the world this day is mov'd the quite contrary way.
titleStmt.author: Transformed church-warden.
Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: "A satire upon the Protestant party." -- Thomason Coll.
Attributed to George Wither in the Wrenn catalogue.
Imperfect: imprint cut away and last blank page wanting.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
